fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Has the rent, price, mortgage value, house cost, and hotel cost of a random property made by Ledian.
When bought, get a random chance card made by Ledian. If it's negative, reroll it.
When you have the full set, get a random chest card made by Ledian, and get a full set item from a Ledian's Illegal Items Incorporated property.
